backend/main.mo: Actor providing user profiles, product and bundle data, orders, download tokens, invite status tracking, and Stripe configuration with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root element and main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing configuration using TanStack Router with storefront and admin routes.
frontend/src/components/account/Principa: Component displaying the user's principal ID with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/FileUpload: Component handling file selection, byte conversion, upload progress, and emitting an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that restricts admin pages based on authentication and admin role checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity and handles authentication, logout, and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to create a profile and submits profile data to the backend.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content and shows a login prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Main store layout with navigation, categories, user/account links, admin access, mobile menu, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/store/CategoryNa: Shows a list of category buttons linking to category pages.
frontend/src/components/store/DownloadBu: Provides a button to download a script file and handles file retrieval, errors, and UI state.
frontend/src/components/store/InviteOnly: Form for submitting a TradingView username required for invite-only product access.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays product details including title, description, price, category, and special badges with a link to the product page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and updating user profiles and roles, plus checking admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements authentication via Internet Identity, managing identity state, login, logout, and context exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrincipalId.ts: Returns the caller’s principal ID and whether they are authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, bundles, categories, and invite statuses via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Defines a mutation hook that creates Stripe checkout sessions using backend API calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for theming and base global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBundlesPag: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting bundles with form dialogs and product selection.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Displays all product categories with a notice explaining automatic category creation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardL: Provides the layout and navigation for all admin dashboard pages with route guarding.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteRequ: Shows invite access requests and allows admins to update their statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Placeholder page explaining that order tracking is pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for managing products, including creation, editing, deletion, and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStripeSett: Admin form for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries, with save handling and status alerts.
Displays a disclaimer detailing trading risks, lack of guarantees, and user responsibility.
frontend/src/pages/legal/PrivacyPolicyPa: Shows a privacy policy covering data collection, usage, sharing, security, rights, and cookies.
frontend/src/pages/legal/RefundPolicyPag: Outlines the refund policy for digital products, including exceptions and request procedures.
frontend/src/pages/legal/TermsPage.tsx: Provides terms of service including licensing, IP rights, account rules, and liability limits.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Shows a payment success confirmation with navigation to purchases or home.
frontend/src/pages/store/AccountPage.tsx: Authenticated account settings page displaying the user’s Internet Identity principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/store/BundleDetailPag: Shows bundle details, included products, and handles purchase via Stripe checkout.
frontend/src/pages/store/BundlesListingP: Lists all available bundles with summary info and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/store/CategoryListing: Displays products for a selected category, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/store/HomePage.tsx: Renders the store homepage with hero content, category navigation, featured products, and bundle previews.
frontend/src/pages/store/ProductDetailPa: Shows detailed product info with purchase flow via Stripe and handles loading or missing product states.
frontend/src/pages/store/PurchasesPage.t: Lists the authenticated user's purchase invite statuses with badges and details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, features, requirements, and architectural notes for the ecommerce system.
